drug.name: Typha latifolia pollen
drug.description: Typha latifolia pollen is the pollen of the Typha latifolia plant. Typha latifolia pollen is mainly used in allergenic testing.

product.name: Mixture of Twenty-Two Standardized and Non-Standardized Grasses

mixture.name: Treatment Set TS333938
mixture.ingredients: Acer negundo pollen + Acer rubrum pollen + Acer saccharinum pollen + Acer saccharum pollen + Agrostis gigantea pollen + Ailanthus altissima pollen + Alternaria alternata + Ambrosia artemisiifolia pollen + Ambrosia bidentata pollen + Ambrosia psilostachya pollen + Ambrosia trifida pollen + Anthoxanthum odoratum pollen + Arrhenatherum elatius pollen + Aspergillus flavus + Aspergillus fumigatus + Aspergillus niger var. niger + Aspergillus repens + Aureobasidium pullulans var. pullutans + Betula papyrifera pollen + Bromus inermis pollen + Bromus secalinus pollen + Carpinus caroliniana pollen + Carya ovata pollen + Carya tomentosa pollen + Celtis occidentalis pollen + Cladosporium cladosporioides + Cochliobolus sativus + Cyclachaena xanthifolia pollen + Cynodon dactylon pollen + Dactylis glomerata pollen + Dermatophagoides pteronyssinus + Elymus repens pollen + Fagus grandifolia pollen + Festuca pratensis pollen + Fraxinus americana pollen + Fusarium oxysporum + Holcus lanatus pollen + Iva annua pollen + Juglans nigra pollen + Juniperus ashei pollen + Juniperus pinchotii pollen + Juniperus virginiana pollen + Liquidambar styraciflua pollen + Lolium perenne pollen + Morus alba pollen + Morus rubra pollen + Mucor racemosus + Pascopyrum smithii pollen + Penicillium camemberti + Penicillium chrysogenum var. chrysogenum + Penicillium chrysogenum var. chrysogenum + Penicillium expansum + Penicillium italicum + Penicillium roqueforti + Phalaris arundinacea pollen + Phleum pratense pollen + Phoma destructiva + Picea pungens pollen + Pinus strobus pollen + Plantago lanceolata pollen + Platanus occidentalis pollen + Poa compressa pollen + Poa pratensis pollen + Populus alba pollen + Rhizopus stolonifer + Salix nigra pollen + Salsola kali pollen + Secale cereale pollen + Sorghum bicolor subsp. drummondii pollen + Sorghum halepense pollen + Triticum aestivum pollen + Typha latifolia pollen + Zea mays pollen
